LanguageData.AEXP_Kangaroo.label: kangaroo
LanguageData.AEXP_Kangaroo.description: Kangaroo is a large, human-sized marsupial with strong legs and powerful arms. It's favoured by tribal hunters due to its tender meat and heat resistant leather. Kangaroos make for powerful adversaries in melee combat, and can be trained easily to become animal super-soldiers.

LanguageData.AEXP_Koala.label: koala
LanguageData.AEXP_Koala.description: Koalas are easily recognizable for their stout body and large, round heads with fluffy ears. They typically inhabit arid and temperate woodlands, but can rarely be seen in tropical areas. Favoured by royal families, koalas are great household animals due to their wonderful nuzzling effect.
